title: Obsidian Integration Suite Red Team Review
description: A comprehensive bundle of the architecture, research, and planned work packages for the Obsidian Agent Integration Suite, submitted for Red Team architectural review.

files.note: Primary instructions for the Red Team Reviewer.
The foundational rules and feature descriptions.
The overarching technical context and implementation plan.
The synthesis of Gemini 3.1 Pro continuous deep research and integration decisions.
The specific breakdown of the 6 new Agent Skills within the proposed obsidian-integration plugin.
Raw output from the Gemini 3.1 Pro Deep Research analysis (Provides raw ground-truth for the Red Team).
Work Package 2: The HF Data Mapping rules.
Work Package 3: The CRUD operations for standard notes and .base dashboards.
Work Package 4: The semantic link Graph Traversal operations.
Work Package 5: The Forge Soul HF Exporter pipeline.
Work Package 6: Automated Link Refactoring and repository cleanup.
